Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Actors: Dev Patel, Freida Pinto, Saurabh Shukla
Plot: A teenager from the slums of Mumbai becomes a contestant on the show 'Kaun Banega Crorepati?' When interrogated under suspicion of cheating, he revisits his past, revealing how he had all the answers.
Country: United Kingdom, France, United States, India
